name: 至尊传奇英雄版
description:
Perfectly restore the feeling of passion! In this game, you can experience the classic legendary style of fighting and grabbing equipment and fighting for the world, as well as the super cool hero system, combined system and continuous technique system, which greatly enhances the fun of the game.

****Game Features****

++ Classic gameplay++
There are hundreds of BOSSes of different difficulties in the game, all of which may drop equipment after killing
The higher the difficulty of the boss, the stronger the equipment dropped
When you become stronger, you can participate in more games, get more resources, and compete for the sand city to become the city lord!

++Occupation++
Currently only the warrior can choose, more than ten kinds of skills can be freely matched
The official version will open two new professions: Mage and Daoist

++ Hero System and Combination Skills ++
After reaching level 30, you can create your own hero for free
The heroes of different professions and the protagonist can form different combination skills with various special effects!

++ Continuous skills ++
After reaching a certain level, you can activate the meridian system
Activate meridians to learn four continuous skills
Releasing continuous skills can deal a lot of damage instantly!

++Multiple systems++
Dark weapon system: you can get a lot of resources of dark weapon system by playing monsters and hanging, and the level of dark weapon can increase the attack attribute after upgrading.
Armor system: You can get a lot of resources of armor system by fighting monsters and hanging, and the armor level can increase the defense attribute after upgrading.
Fashion system: High-level BOSSes have a probability of dropping fashion pieces, which can be synthesized into beautiful fashion, and fashion has special attributes.
Title system: you can activate the title by reaching certain conditions and get a lot of attributes
Internal power system: you can increase internal power experience by fighting monsters, the higher the internal power, the stronger the damage, the stronger the damage immunity
Internal skill: after learning internal skill, you can increase your own skill damage and reduce the skill damage from other players
Equipment recycling: equipment can be exchanged for yuan treasure and experience, the higher the equipment level, the more generous the reward for recycling
Skill upgrade: by fighting BOSS drops pages, you can enhance the skill level, enhance the damage power
